thread.title: ‘It Was Delusional’: CNN’s David Gergen Rips Trump’s Health Care Bill Reaction
thread.title_full: ‘It Was Delusional’: CNN’s David Gergen Rips Trump’s Health Care Bill Reaction

author: Justin Baragona
title: ‘It Was Delusional’: CNN’s David Gergen Rips Trump’s Health Care Bill Reaction
text:
‘It Was Delusional’: CNN’s David Gergen Rips Trump’s Health Care Bill Reaction by Justin Baragona | 5:33   
Following President Donald Trump’s response to the news that the American Health Care Act had been pulled — at his request — after there was a lack of support among the House GOP caucus, CNN political analyst David Gergen tore into the president for not taking responsibility for the failure of the healthcare bill. 
“It was delusional in some ways,” Gergen told host Jake Tapper when asked his thoughts on Trump’s reaction. “And I thought, [Speaker of the House] Paul Ryan manned up. He took responsibility.” 
He added, “This is a man who just shoved it off on other people and described things in ways that are just misleading.” 
The ex-presidential advisor went on to describe Trump’s beginning of his presidency as perhaps “worst first hundred days we’ve ever seen in a president.” 
Prior to Trump’s response, Ryan held a press conference where he acknowledged that the GOP is having a tough time going from being an opposition party to a governing one. 
Watch the clip above, via CNN.
